医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Unfold AI 在前列腺癌风险预测方面优于传统方法BJUI Compass 最近发表的一项研究证实了 Unfold AI™ 的突破性潜力，这是一种经 FDA 批准的人工智能 (AI) 算法，由个性化前列腺癌护理领域的领导者 Avenda Health 开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Unfold-AI-outperforms-conventional-methods-in-prostate-cancer-risk-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Unfold-AI-outperforms-conventional-methods-in-prostate-cancer-risk-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19084f8c-d7ab-4b16-8447-be287f897296 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 08:29:00 -0400 Unfold AI outperforms conventional methods in prostate cancer risk prediction
感谢 Reddit，一种新的诊断结果正在全国范围内传播在今年夏天发布在 Reddit 上的一段视频中，露西·罗森塔尔 (Lucie Rosenthal) 的表情开始变得专注而不确定，在事情发生之前全神贯注地看着镜头。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Thanks-to-Reddit-a-new-diagnosis-is-bubbling-up-across-the-nation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Thanks-to-Reddit-a-new-diagnosis-is-bubbling-up-across-the-nation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39b68620-7c6f-4281-b6b5-e9a6aac0d376 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:55:55 -0400 Thanks to Reddit, a new diagnosis is bubbling up across the nation
随着创纪录的高温席卷美国，一些人必须在食品和能源账单之间做出选择六月份，炎热的天气覆盖了东南部大部分地区，史黛西·弗里曼 (Stacey Freeman) 使用窗户装置为她位于北卡罗来纳州费耶特维尔的隔热不良的移动房屋降温。整个冬天，这位 44 岁的妈妈都靠小型取暖器生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/As-record-heat-sweeps-the-us-some-people-must-choose- Between-food-and-energy-bills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/As-record-heat-sweeps-the-us-some-people-must-choose- Between-food-and-energy-bills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fe9ebd5-6b2c-4365-a1a2-e3c2c41a9b93 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:49:00 -0400 As record heat sweeps the us, some people must choose between food and energy bills
xFakeSci 工具能否识别人工智能生成的虚假内容？研究人员评估了 xFakeSci 在区分真实科学内容和 ChatGPT 生成内容方面的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Can-the-xFakeSci-tool-identify-fake-AI- generated-content.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Can-the-xFakeSci-tool-identify-fake-AI- generated-content.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54ec1ce6-3a72-43cb-b92d-5019b183c22d Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:28:00 -0400 Can the xFakeSci tool identify fake AI-generated content?
地中海饮食与超加工食品：对老年人虚弱的影响研究人员评估了超加工食品和地中海饮食评分是否与老年人的虚弱和心脏代谢疾病相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Mediterranean-diet-vs-Ultra-processed-foods-Impact-on-frailty-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Mediterranean-diet-vs-Ultra-processed-foods-Impact-on-frailty-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32bf008a-45b4-416d-a832-6f8b88801142 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:20:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet vs. Ultra-processed foods: Impact on frailty in older adults
全球研究探讨肉类消费与 2 型糖尿病风险之间的联系研究人员评估了食用未加工红肉、加工肉类和家禽与 2 型糖尿病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Global-study-explores-the-connection- Between-meat-conspiration-and-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Global-study-explores-the-connection- Between-meat-conspiration-and-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2101af5-4f3d-4225-9d73-8a780b47d526 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:08:00 -0400 Global study explores the connection between meat consumption and type 2 diabetes risk
研究揭示性激素如何调节免疫系统功能研究结果表明，跨性别男性的睾酮治疗会改变免疫系统反应，这对疾病易感性和治疗产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-reveals-how-sex-hormones-regulate-immune-system-functions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-reveals-how-sex-hormones-regulate-immune-system-functions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f71cfbe-768a-4e5a-a6da-46519721a5f5 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 05:57:00 -0400 Study reveals how sex hormones regulate immune system functions
保持心理弹性可以降低全因死亡的风险该研究强调了心理弹性对死亡率的保护作用，表明其对于延长老龄化人口寿命的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Being-psychologically-resilient-can-reduce-the-risk-of-all-cause-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Being-psychologically-resilient-can-reduce-the-risk-of-all-cause-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60a79afa-70f6-42ce-8e7a-cad5d78b4681 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 05:29:00 -0400 Being psychologically resilient can reduce the risk of all-cause mortality
即使没有症状，抑郁症也会在大脑中留下一致的印记抑郁症中持续的显着性网络增长凸显了神经生物学变化，为情绪状态转变和治疗反应提供了潜在的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Depression-has-a-concient-mark-in-the-brain-even-when-symptoms-are-absent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Depression-has-a-concient-mark-in-the-brain-even-when-symptoms-are-absent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3a18a0d-0de9-4f45-a80e-12f564144618 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Depression has a consistent mark in the brain even when symptoms are absent
夜间使用手机会恶化儿童的睡眠和心理健康，尤其是网络欺凌的受害者夜间使用手机对睡眠和心理健康有显着影响，网络欺凌加剧了儿童和青少年的心理困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Phone-use-at-night-worsens-sleep-and-mental-health-in-kids-special-cyberbullying-victims.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Phone-use-at-night-worsens-sleep-and-mental-health-in-kids-尤其-cyberbullying-victims.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=724bad2d-f997-4d07-af4b-2b19524a3ed2 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 04:49:00 -0400 Phone use at night worsens sleep and mental health in kids, especially cyberbullying victims
